member.name: M:HTML.HTMLParser.pTable.Convert_Table_DataTable(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a basic DataTable. Column headers are based on the HTML table header tags.

member.name: M:HTML.HTMLParser.pTable.Convert_Table_XML(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a basic format XML Document. Each row is labeled based on its index and each child element is labeled based on its column header

member.summary: Returns an array of HTML Table Rows.

member.summary: Represents a series of HTML Table parsing methods.

member.summary: Removes any HTML tags with Start and End Tags

member.name: M:HTML.ParsingFuncs.HasMarkup(System.String)
member.summary: Determines whether the provided HTML markup contains an HTML tag with both Start and End tags or it contains only a Start tag.
member.returns: -1: Only Start tag 0: No HTML markup 1: Both Start and End tags

member.name: M:HTML.ParsingFuncs.PeakTag(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the name of the next potential tag. Returns empty string if improper search.

member.name: P:HTML.HTMLWriter.HTMLImageMap.HTMLMapArea.Target
member.summary: Set the target link type.
member.value: Blank: Opens a new window or tab. Self: Redirects the current window. Parent: Opens in the parent frame. Top: Opens in the full body of the current window. Frame: Opens in the specified iFrame HTML element. The iFrame ID property must be set.

member.summary: Adds a new instance of an HTML Map Area to the Map element of the current instance of an HTML Image Map.
member.param: Only applies to first addition of an HTML Map Area, this sets the name of the HTML Image Map. This name is used when applying coordinates to an HTML Image element.

Only applies to the first addition of an HTML Map Area, this sets the name of the HTML Image Map. This name is used when applying coordinates to an HTML Image element.
